TableView.name: FCS_AUDIT_PP_PROMO_BARANG
TableView.userDefinedSQL:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW FCS_AUDIT_PP_PROMO_BARANG
AS
SELECT PRODUK_LINE, BARANG_PROMO_LINE, FULL_NAME, TASK_ROLE, PROPOSAL_ID, PROMO_PRODUK_ID, FIELD_NAME, FIELD_VALUE FROM (
SELECT B.PRODUK_LINE,
B.BARANG_PROMO_LINE,
B.PROPOSAL_ID,
B.AUDIT_ID,
B.PROMO_PRODUK_ID,
UPPER(B.FULL_NAME) AS FULL_NAME,
B.TASK_ROLE,
CASE WHEN (B.TASK_ROLE = 'Approver' AND (B.PREV_PRODUCT_CLASS = B.PRODUCT_CLASS)) THEN '' ELSE (SELECT MC.DESCRIPTION FROM APPS.MTL_CATEGORIES_V MC WHERE MC.CATEGORY_CONCAT_SEGS = B.PRODUCT_CLASS AND MC.STRUCTURE_NAME = 'FCS_CLASS') END AS PRODUK_CLASS,
CASE WHEN (B.TASK_ROLE = 'Approver' AND (B.PREV_PRODUCT_BRAND = B.PRODUCT_BRAND)) THEN '' ELSE (SELECT MC.DESCRIPTION FROM APPS.MTL_CATEGORIES_V MC WHERE MC.CATEGORY_CONCAT_SEGS = B.PRODUCT_BRAND AND MC.STRUCTURE_NAME = 'FCS_BRAND') END AS PRODUK_BRAND,
CASE WHEN (B.TASK_ROLE = 'Approver' AND (B.PREV_PRODUCT_EXT = B.PRODUCT_EXT)) THEN '' ELSE (SELECT MC.DESCRIPTION FROM APPS.MTL_CATEGORIES_V MC WHERE MC.CATEGORY_CONCAT_SEGS = B.PRODUCT_EXT AND MC.STRUCTURE_NAME = 'FCS_EXTENTION') END AS PRODUK_EXTENTION,
CASE WHEN (B.TASK_ROLE = 'Approver' AND (B.PREV_PRODUCT_PACK = B.PRODUCT_PACK)) THEN '' ELSE (SELECT MC.DESCRIPTION FROM APPS.MTL_CATEGORIES_V MC WHERE MC.CATEGORY_CONCAT_SEGS = B.PRODUCT_PACK AND MC.STRUCTURE_NAME = 'FCS_PACKAGING') END AS PRODUK_PACKAGING,
CASE WHEN (B.TASK_ROLE = 'Approver' AND (B.PREV_PRODUCT_VARIANT = B.PRODUCT_VARIANT)) THEN '' ELSE B.PRODUCT_VARIANT END AS PRODUK_VARIANT,
CASE WHEN (B.TASK_ROLE = 'Approver' AND (B.PREV_PRODUCT_ITEM = B.PRODUCT_ITEM)) THEN '' ELSE B.PRODUCT_ITEM END AS PRODUK_ITEM,
CASE WHEN (B.TASK_ROLE = 'Approver' AND (B.PREV_TARGET_PRICE = B.TARGET_PRICE)) THEN '' ELSE B.TARGET_PRICE END AS PRICE_TARGET,
CASE WHEN (B.TASK_ROLE = 'Approver' AND (B.PREV_PB_PRODUCT_CATEGORY = B.PB_PRODUCT_CATEGORY)) THEN '' ELSE (SELECT MC.DESCRIPTION FROM APPS.MTL_CATEGORIES_V MC WHERE MC.CATEGORY_CONCAT_SEGS = B.PB_PRODUCT_CATEGORY AND MC.STRUCTURE_NAME = 'FCS_CATEGORY') END AS PB_PRODUK_CATEGORY,
CASE WHEN (B.TASK_ROLE = 'Approver' AND (B.PREV_PB_PRODUCT_CLASS = B.PB_PRODUCT_CLASS)) THEN '' ELSE (SELECT MC.DESCRIPTION FROM APPS.MTL_CATEGORIES_V MC WHERE MC.CATEGORY_CONCAT_SEGS = B.PB_PRODUCT_CLASS AND MC.STRUCTURE_NAME = 'FCS_CLASS') END AS PB_PRODUK_CLASS,
CASE WHEN (B.TASK_ROLE = 'Approver' AND (B.PREV_PB_PRODUCT_BRAND = B.PB_PRODUCT_BRAND)) THEN '' ELSE (SELECT MC.DESCRIPTION FROM APPS.MTL_CATEGORIES_V MC WHERE MC.CATEGORY_CONCAT_SEGS = B.PB_PRODUCT_BRAND AND MC.STRUCTURE_NAME = 'FCS_BRAND') END AS PB_PRODUK_BRAND,
CASE WHEN (B.TASK_ROLE = 'Approver' AND (B.PREV_PB_PRODUCT_EXT = B.PB_PRODUCT_EXT)) THEN '' ELSE (SELECT MC.DESCRIPTION FROM APPS.MTL_CATEGORIES_V MC WHERE MC.CATEGORY_CONCAT_SEGS = B.PB_PRODUCT_EXT AND MC.STRUCTURE_NAME = 'FCS_EXTENTION') END AS PB_PRODUK_EXTENTION,
CASE WHEN (B.TASK_ROLE = 'Approver' AND (B.PREV_PB_PRODUCT_PACK = B.PB_PRODUCT_PACK)) THEN '' ELSE (SELECT MC.DESCRIPTION FROM APPS.MTL_CATEGORIES_V MC WHERE MC.CATEGORY_CONCAT_SEGS = B.PB_PRODUCT_PACK AND MC.STRUCTURE_NAME = 'FCS_PACKAGING') END AS PB_PRODUK_PACKAGING,
CASE WHEN (B.TASK_ROLE = 'Approver' AND (B.PREV_PB_PRODUCT_VARIANT = B.PB_PRODUCT_VARIANT)) THEN '' ELSE B.PB_PRODUCT_VARIANT END AS PB_PRODUK_VARIANT,
CASE WHEN (B.TASK_ROLE = 'Approver' AND (B.PREV_PB_PRODUCT_ITEM = B.PB_PRODUCT_ITEM)) THEN '' ELSE B.PB_PRODUCT_ITEM END AS PB_PRODUK_ITEM,
CASE WHEN (B.TASK_ROLE = 'Approver' AND (B.PREV_PB_QTY = B.PB_QTY)) THEN '' ELSE B.PB_QTY END AS PROMO_BARANG_QTY,
CASE WHEN (B.TASK_ROLE = 'Approver' AND (B.PREV_PRICE_VAL = B.PRICE_VAL)) THEN '' ELSE B.PRICE_VAL END AS PROMO_BARANG_PRICE,
CASE WHEN (B.TASK_ROLE = 'Approver' AND (B.PREV_PB_NON_YEARLY = B.PB_NON_YEARLY)) THEN '' ELSE B.PB_NON_YEARLY END AS PROMO_BARANG_TPB_OT,
CASE WHEN (B.TASK_ROLE = 'Approver' AND (B.PREV_PB_YEARLY = B.PB_YEARLY)) THEN '' ELSE B.PB_YEARLY END AS PROMO_BARANG_PB_MF,
B.APPROVAL_ACTION AS APPROVE_ACTION
FROM (
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY AP.PROPOSAL_ID, AP.AUDIT_ID, APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PB.PROMO_BONUS_ID ORDER BY APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, AP.AUDIT_ID, PB.PROMO_BONUS_ID) AS PRODUK_LINE,
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY AP.PROPOSAL_ID, AP.AUDIT_ID, APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID ORDER BY APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, AP.AUDIT_ID, PB.PROMO_BONUS_ID) AS BARANG_PROMO_LINE,
AP.PROPOSAL_ID,
AP.AUDIT_ID,
APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID,
AP.APPROVAL_ACTION,
NVL (AP.MODIFIED_BY, AP.CREATED_BY) AS USER_NAME,
NVL (UA.FULL_NAME, AP.CREATED_BY) AS FULL_NAME,
CASE WHEN MODIFIED_DATE IS NULL THEN 'Requester' ELSE 'Approver' END AS TASK_ROLE,
APP.PRODUCT_CLASS,
NVL(LAG (APP.PRODUCT_CLASS,1) OVER (PARTITION BY APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID ORDER BY APP.PRODUCT_CLASS),APP.PRODUCT_CLASS) AS PREV_PRODUCT_CLASS,
APP.PRODUCT_BRAND,
NVL(LAG (APP.PRODUCT_BRAND,1) OVER (PARTITION BY APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID ORDER BY APP.PRODUCT_BRAND),APP.PRODUCT_BRAND) AS PREV_PRODUCT_BRAND,
APP.PRODUCT_EXT,
NVL(LAG(APP.PRODUCT_EXT,1) OVER (PARTITION BY APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID ORDER BY APP.PRODUCT_EXT),APP.PRODUCT_EXT) AS PREV_PRODUCT_EXT,
APP.PRODUCT_PACK,
NVL(LAG(APP.PRODUCT_PACK,1) OVER (PARTITION BY APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID ORDER BY APP.PRODUCT_PACK),APP.PRODUCT_PACK) AS PREV_PRODUCT_PACK,
(SELECT RTRIM(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(REPLACE( REPLACE( XMLAGG( XMLELEMENT("A",PV.VARIANT_DESC) ORDER BY 1).GETCLOBVAL(), '',''), '',', '), 1995, 1 ), ', ') FROM AUDIT_PRODUK_VARIANT PV WHERE PV.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND PV.AUDIT_ID = APP.AUDIT_ID GROUP BY PV.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS PRODUCT_VARIANT,
NVL(LAG((SELECT RTRIM(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(REPLACE( REPLACE( XMLAGG( XMLELEMENT("A",PV.VARIANT_DESC) ORDER BY 1).GETCLOBVAL(), '',''), '',', '), 1995, 1 ), ', ') FROM AUDIT_PRODUK_VARIANT PV WHERE PV.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND PV.AUDIT_ID = APP.AUDIT_ID GROUP BY PV.PROMO_PRODUK_ID),1) OVER (PARTITION BY APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID ORDER BY AP.PROPOSAL_ID, AP.AUDIT_ID,APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID),(SELECT RTRIM(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(REPLACE( REPLACE( XMLAGG( XMLELEMENT("A",PV.VARIANT_DESC) ORDER BY 1).GETCLOBVAL(), '',''), '',','), 1995, 1 ), ',') FROM AUDIT_PRODUK_VARIANT PV WHERE PV.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND PV.AUDIT_ID = APP.AUDIT_ID GROUP BY PV.PROMO_PRODUK_ID)) AS PREV_PRODUCT_VARIANT,
(SELECT RTRIM(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(REPLACE( REPLACE( XMLAGG( XMLELEMENT("A",PI.ITEM_DESC) ORDER BY 1).GETCLOBVAL(), '',''), '',', '), 1995, 1 ), ', ') FROM AUDIT_PRODUK_ITEM PI WHERE PI.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND PI.AUDIT_ID = APP.AUDIT_ID GROUP BY PI.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS PRODUCT_ITEM,
NVL(LAG((SELECT RTRIM(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(REPLACE( REPLACE( XMLAGG( XMLELEMENT("A",PI.ITEM_DESC) ORDER BY 1).GETCLOBVAL(), '',''), '',', '), 1995, 1 ), ', ') FROM AUDIT_PRODUK_ITEM PI WHERE PI.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND PI.AUDIT_ID = APP.AUDIT_ID GROUP BY PI.PROMO_PRODUK_ID),1) OVER (PARTITION BY APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID ORDER BY AP.PROPOSAL_ID, AP.AUDIT_ID,APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID),(SELECT RTRIM(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(REPLACE( REPLACE( XMLAGG( XMLELEMENT("A",PI.ITEM_DESC) ORDER BY 1).GETCLOBVAL(), '',''), '',','), 1995, 1 ), ',') FROM AUDIT_PRODUK_ITEM PI WHERE PI.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND PI.AUDIT_ID = APP.AUDIT_ID GROUP BY PI.PROMO_PRODUK_ID)) AS PREV_PRODUCT_ITEM,
TO_CHAR(NVL(TGT.PRICE,0)) AS TARGET_PRICE,
NVL(LAG(TO_CHAR(NVL(TGT.PRICE,0)),1) OVER (PARTITION BY APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID ORDER BY AP.PROPOSAL_ID, AP.AUDIT_ID),TO_CHAR(NVL(TGT.PRICE,0))) AS PREV_TARGET_PRICE,
PB.PRODUCT_CATEGORY AS PB_PRODUCT_CATEGORY,
LAG (PB.PRODUCT_CATEGORY,1) OVER (PARTITION BY APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PB.PROMO_BONUS_ID ORDER BY APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, AP.AUDIT_ID, PB.PROMO_BONUS_ID) AS PREV_PB_PRODUCT_CATEGORY,
PB.PRODUCT_CLASS AS PB_PRODUCT_CLASS,
LAG (PB.PRODUCT_CLASS,1) OVER (PARTITION BY APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PB.PROMO_BONUS_ID ORDER BY APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, AP.AUDIT_ID, PB.PROMO_BONUS_ID) AS PREV_PB_PRODUCT_CLASS,
PB.PRODUCT_BRAND AS PB_PRODUCT_BRAND,
LAG (PB.PRODUCT_BRAND,1) OVER (PARTITION BY APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PB.PROMO_BONUS_ID ORDER BY APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, AP.AUDIT_ID, PB.PROMO_BONUS_ID) AS PREV_PB_PRODUCT_BRAND,
PB.PRODUCT_EXT AS PB_PRODUCT_EXT,
LAG(PB.PRODUCT_EXT,1) OVER (PARTITION BY APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PB.PROMO_BONUS_ID ORDER BY APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, AP.AUDIT_ID, PB.PROMO_BONUS_ID) AS PREV_PB_PRODUCT_EXT,
PB.PRODUCT_PACK AS PB_PRODUCT_PACK,
LAG(PB.PRODUCT_PACK,1) OVER (PARTITION BY APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PB.PROMO_BONUS_ID ORDER BY APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, AP.AUDIT_ID, PB.PROMO_BONUS_ID) AS PREV_PB_PRODUCT_PACK,
(SELECT RTRIM(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(REPLACE( REPLACE( XMLAGG( XMLELEMENT("A",PV.VARIANT_DESC) ORDER BY 1).GETCLOBVAL(), '',''), '',', '), 1995, 1 ), ', ') FROM AUDIT_PROMO_BONUS_VARIANT PV WHERE PV.AUDIT_ID = APP.AUDIT_ID AND PV.PROMO_BONUS_ID = PB.PROMO_BONUS_ID GROUP BY PV.PROMO_BONUS_ID) AS PB_PRODUCT_VARIANT,
LAG((SELECT RTRIM(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(REPLACE( REPLACE( XMLAGG( XMLELEMENT("A",PV.VARIANT_DESC) ORDER BY 1).GETCLOBVAL(), '',''), '',', '), 1995, 1 ), ', ') FROM AUDIT_PROMO_BONUS_VARIANT PV WHERE PV.AUDIT_ID = APP.AUDIT_ID AND PV.PROMO_BONUS_ID = PB.PROMO_BONUS_ID GROUP BY PV.PROMO_BONUS_ID),1) OVER (PARTITION BY APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PB.PROMO_BONUS_ID ORDER BY APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, AP.AUDIT_ID, PB.PROMO_BONUS_ID) AS PREV_PB_PRODUCT_VARIANT,
(SELECT RTRIM(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(REPLACE( REPLACE( XMLAGG( XMLELEMENT("A",PI.ITEM_DESC) ORDER BY 1).GETCLOBVAL(), '',''), '',', '), 1995, 1 ), ', ') FROM AUDIT_PROMO_BONUS_ITEM PI WHERE PI.AUDIT_ID = APP.AUDIT_ID AND PI.PROMO_BONUS_ID = PB.PROMO_BONUS_ID GROUP BY PI.PROMO_BONUS_ID) AS PB_PRODUCT_ITEM,
LAG((SELECT RTRIM(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(REPLACE( REPLACE( XMLAGG( XMLELEMENT("A",PI.ITEM_DESC) ORDER BY 1).GETCLOBVAL(), '',''), '',', '), 1995, 1 ), ', ') FROM AUDIT_PROMO_BONUS_ITEM PI WHERE PI.AUDIT_ID = APP.AUDIT_ID AND PI.PROMO_BONUS_ID = PB.PROMO_BONUS_ID GROUP BY PI.PROMO_BONUS_ID),1) OVER (PARTITION BY APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PB.PROMO_BONUS_ID ORDER BY APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, AP.AUDIT_ID, PB.PROMO_BONUS_ID) AS PREV_PB_PRODUCT_ITEM,
TO_CHAR(NVL(PB.QTY_FROM,0)) AS PB_QTY,
LAG(TO_CHAR(NVL(PB.QTY_FROM,0)),1) OVER (PARTITION BY APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PB.PROMO_BONUS_ID ORDER BY APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, AP.AUDIT_ID, PB.PROMO_BONUS_ID) AS PREV_PB_QTY,
TO_CHAR(NVL(PB.PRICE_VAL,0)) AS PRICE_VAL,
LAG(TO_CHAR(NVL(PB.PRICE_VAL,0)),1) OVER (PARTITION BY APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PB.PROMO_BONUS_ID ORDER BY APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, AP.AUDIT_ID, PB.PROMO_BONUS_ID) AS PREV_PRICE_VAL,
TO_CHAR(NVL(PB.DISC_NON_YEARLY,0)) AS PB_NON_YEARLY,
LAG(TO_CHAR(NVL(PB.DISC_NON_YEARLY,0)),1) OVER (PARTITION BY APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PB.PROMO_BONUS_ID ORDER BY APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, AP.AUDIT_ID, PB.PROMO_BONUS_ID) AS PREV_PB_NON_YEARLY,
TO_CHAR(NVL(PB.DISC_YEARLY,0)) AS PB_YEARLY,
LAG(TO_CHAR(NVL(PB.DISC_YEARLY,0)),1) OVER (PARTITION BY APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PB.PROMO_BONUS_ID ORDER BY APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, AP.AUDIT_ID, PB.PROMO_BONUS_ID) AS PREV_PB_YEARLY
FROM AUDIT_PROPOSAL AP, APP_USER_ACCESS UA, AUDIT_PROMO_PRODUK APP, AUDIT_TARGET TGT, AUDIT_PROMO_BONUS PB
WHERE NVL (AP.MODIFIED_BY, AP.CREATED_BY) = UA.USER_NAME
AND APP.AUDIT_ID = AP.AUDIT_ID
AND APP.PROPOSAL_ID = AP.PROPOSAL_ID
AND TGT.AUDIT_ID = AP.AUDIT_ID
AND TGT.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID
AND PB.AUDIT_ID = AP.AUDIT_ID
AND PB.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = APP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID
ORDER BY AP.AUDIT_ID
) B
) UNPIVOT INCLUDE NULLS (FIELD_VALUE FOR FIELD_NAME IN (APPROVE_ACTION, PRODUK_CLASS, PRODUK_BRAND, PRODUK_EXTENTION, PRODUK_PACKAGING, PRODUK_VARIANT, PRODUK_ITEM, PRICE_TARGET, PB_PRODUK_CATEGORY, PB_PRODUK_CLASS, PB_PRODUK_BRAND, PB_PRODUK_EXTENTION, PB_PRODUK_PACKAGING, PB_PRODUK_VARIANT, PB_PRODUK_ITEM, PROMO_BARANG_QTY, PROMO_BARANG_PRICE, PROMO_BARANG_TPB_OT, PROMO_BARANG_PB_MF))
